mapper.sql: select cost_id, track_id, order_id, order_number, xianghao, xiangxing, px_entry_date, px_entry_time, px_enter_car, px_enter_lead_number, xg_xiangkuang, xg_isrepair, xg_ismingpai, xg_boat, xg_send, xg_check, road_isbill, road_check, createdate, createuserid, createusername, baoguan_docu, suiche_docu, waybill, paystate, gd_consignee, gd_remark, gd_check, fayun_date, fayun_state, is_jg, is_pz, edit_remark, xg_xsphoto, xg_xsstate, xh_check, isPlanedDelivery, bgcaodan, bgcaodan_confirm, documents_give, weight_Check, customs_process, bgremark, classzy_no, classzyno_time, classzyno_remark, jz2_remark, rc_weight, jz_weight, car_number, jz2data, zhengben_give, yichang_date, roadtime, gdtime, xgtime, Real_unloadSite, mingpai_gh, cepian_result, transport_Dept, ISJZ_LDbus, cause_nojz, roadlog_remark, Actual_classbh, xianghao_place, is_applynum, container_kgs, lieshu, guanwustate, isunify, Consignee, Consignee_E, Box_belong, Consignor, ConsignorState, GoodsNameHS, ArrivalStation, CBXWarehouse, CarrierStationCode, PaymentCode, SupplyContractNo, zyunit_time, yundan_number, yundan_weight, yundan_xweight, yundan_totalweight, PrivateLine, Consignee_R, Consignor_R, GoodsName_C, GoodsName_E, GoodsNames, ArrivalStationHS, GJkouan, Formalities, max_totalweight, max_load, iso_code, suichestate, SC_Operator, SC_Operatime, actualClass_bh, gw_remark, gw_piaoshu, gw_Operator, gw_Operatime, planUnloadTime, yd_Operator, sc_remark, sc_XSnum, sc_XSnumfee, sc_SHnum, sc_SHnumfee, zx_weight, dl_checktime, fenghao, gwfenghao, shifenghao, goodsname, Consignor_C, fhtime from busi_zy_info

select zy.cost_id as costId, zy.track_id as trackId, zy.order_id as orderId, ord.order_number as orderNumber,zy.xianghao as xianghao, zy.classzy_no as classzyNo, zy.lieshu as lieshu, zy.classzyno_time as classzynoTime,zy.classzyno_remark as classzynoRemark,ord.line_typeid as lineTypeid from busi_zy_info zy
mapper.select:
select zy.cost_id as costId,zy.xianghao as xianghao,zy.order_id as orderId,zy.Consignor_C as consignorC, zy.Consignor as consignor,zy.Consignor_R as consignorR,zy.Box_belong as boxBelong,zy.Consignee as consignee, zy.Consignee_E as consigneeE,zy.Consignee_R as consigneeR,zy.PrivateLine as privateline,zy.GJkouan as gjkouan,zy.GoodsName_C as goodsnameC, zy.GoodsName_E as goodsnameE,zy.GoodsNameHS as goodsnamehs,zy.GoodsNames as goodsnames,zy.yundan_number as yundanNumber,zy.yundan_weight as yundanWeight, zy.yundan_xweight as yundanXweight,zy.Formalities as formalities,zy.ConsignorState as consignorstate,zy.ArrivalStation as arrivalstation, zy.CBXWarehouse as cbxwarehouse,zy.CarrierStationCode as carrierstationcode,zy.PaymentCode as paymentcode,zy.SupplyContractNo as supplycontractno, zy.zyunit_time as zyunitTime,zy.yundan_totalweight as yundanTotalweight,zy.ArrivalStationHS as arrivalstationhs,ord.order_unloadSite as orderUnloadsite, ord.order_number as orderNumber,zy.is_applynum as isApplynum,ord.IsConsolidation as isConsolidation, ord.ship_order_binningWay as shipOrderBinningWay, ord.class_EastAndWest as classEastandwest from busi_zy_info zy left join busi_shippingorder ord on ord.order_ID = zy.order_id
zy.order_id = #{orderId} and zy.del_flag = '0'

select ord.Class_date as classDate,zy.cost_id as costId,zy.xianghao as xianghao,zy.order_id as orderId,ord.order_number as orderNumber, goods.goods_name as goodsName,ord.order_unloadSite as orderUnloadsite,zy.yd_Operator as ydOperator,track.actual_class_date_value as actualClassDateValue, ord.client_unit as clientUnit,clients.client_tjr as clientTjr,ord.container_type as containerType,ord.container_boxAmount as containerBoxamount, zy.is_applynum as isApplynum,zy.dl_checktime as dlChecktime,zy.Consignee as consignee,zy.Consignee_E as consigneeE,zy.Box_belong as boxBelong, zy.fenghao as fenghao,zy.Consignor_C as consignorC,zy.Consignor as consignor,zy.GoodsNames as goodsnames,zy.yundan_number as yundanNumber, zy.yundan_weight as yundanWeight,zy.yundan_xweight as yundanXweight,zy.yundan_totalweight as yundanTotalweight,zy.CBXWarehouse as cbxwarehouse, zy.ArrivalStation as arrivalstation,zy.PrivateLine as privateline,zy.GJkouan as gjkouan,zy.CarrierStationCode as carrierstationcode, zy.PaymentCode as paymentcode,zy.ConsignorState as consignorstate,zy.SupplyContractNo as supplycontractno,zy.Formalities as formalities, zy.fenghao as fenghao,ord.order_merchandiser as orderMerchandiser from busi_zy_info zy left join busi_shippingorder ord on ord.order_ID = zy.order_id left join busi_shippingorder_goods goods on goods.order_ID = zy.order_id left join track_goods_status track on track.id = zy.track_id left join busi_clients clients on clients.client_ID = ord.client_ID
ord.line_typeid = '2' and zy.del_flag = '0' and ord.order_number like concat('%', #{orderNumber}, '%') and zy.xianghao like concat('%', #{xianghao}, '%') and ord.Class_date = #{classDate,jdbcType=DATE} and zy.classzy_no like concat('%', #{classzyNo}, '%') and ord.order_unloadSite like concat('%', #{orderUnloadsite}, '%') and track.actual_class_date_value = #{actualClassDateValue,jdbcType=DATE} and zy.yd_Operator like concat('%', #{ydOperator}, '%') and ord.client_unit like concat('%', #{clientUnit}, '%')
order by ord.tj_time desc
where order_id = #{orderId} and xianghao = #{xianghao} and del_flag = '0' order by track_id desc limit 1

select order_id as orderId,xianghao as boxNum,Consignor_C as consignorC,Consignor as consignor,Consignor_R as consignorR, Box_belong as boxBelong,Consignee as consignee,Consignee_E as consigneeE,Consignee_R as consigneeR,PrivateLine as privateline, GJkouan as gjkouan,GoodsName_C as goodsnameC,GoodsName_E as goodsnameE,GoodsNameHS as goodsnamehs,GoodsNames as goodsnames, yundan_number as yundanNumber,yundan_weight as yundanWeight,yundan_xweight as yundanXweight,Formalities as formalities, ConsignorState as consignorstate,ArrivalStation as arrivalstation,CBXWarehouse as cbxwarehouse,CarrierStationCode as carrierstationcode, PaymentCode as paymentcode,SupplyContractNo as supplycontractno,zyunit_time as zyunitTime,yundan_totalweight as yundanTotalweight, ArrivalStationHS as arrivalstationhs,is_applynum as isApplynum from busi_zy_info where cost_id = #{costId}
left join busi_shippingorder ord on ord.order_ID = zy.order_id where zy.track_id = #{trackId}
mapper.insert:
insert into busi_zy_info
cost_id, track_id, order_id, order_number, xianghao, xiangxing, px_entry_date, px_entry_time, px_enter_car, px_enter_lead_number, xg_xiangkuang, xg_isrepair, xg_ismingpai, xg_boat, xg_send, xg_check, road_isbill, road_check, createdate, createuserid, createusername, baoguan_docu, suiche_docu, waybill, paystate, gd_consignee, gd_remark, gd_check, fayun_date, fayun_state, is_jg, is_pz, edit_remark, xg_xsphoto, xg_xsstate, xh_check, isPlanedDelivery, bgcaodan, bgcaodan_confirm, documents_give, weight_Check, customs_process, bgremark, classzy_no, jz2_remark, rc_weight, jz_weight, car_number, jz2data, zhengben_give, yichang_date, roadtime, gdtime, xgtime, Real_unloadSite, mingpai_gh, cepian_result, transport_Dept, ISJZ_LDbus, cause_nojz, roadlog_remark, Actual_classbh, xianghao_place, is_applynum, container_kgs, lieshu, guanwustate, isunify, classzyno_time, classzyno_remark, Consignee, Consignee_E, Box_belong, Consignor, ConsignorState, GoodsNameHS, ArrivalStation, CBXWarehouse, CarrierStationCode, PaymentCode, SupplyContractNo, zyunit_time, yundan_number, yundan_weight, yundan_xweight, yundan_totalweight, PrivateLine, Consignee_R, Consignor_R, GoodsName_C, GoodsName_E, GoodsNames, ArrivalStationHS, GJkouan, Formalities, max_totalweight, max_load, iso_code, suichestate, SC_Operator, SC_Operatime, actualClass_bh, gw_remark, gw_piaoshu, gw_Operator, gw_Operatime, planUnloadTime, yd_Operator, sc_remark, sc_XSnum, sc_XSnumfee, sc_SHnum, sc_SHnumfee, zx_weight, dl_checktime, fenghao, gwfenghao, shifenghao, goodsname, Consignor_C, fhtime,
#{costId}, #{trackId}, #{orderId}, #{orderNumber}, #{xianghao}, #{xiangxing}, #{pxEntryDate}, #{pxEntryTime}, #{pxEnterCar}, #{pxEnterLeadNumber}, #{xgXiangkuang}, #{xgIsrepair}, #{xgIsmingpai}, #{xgBoat}, #{xgSend}, #{xgCheck}, #{roadIsbill}, #{roadCheck}, #{createdate}, #{createuserid}, #{createusername}, #{baoguanDocu}, #{suicheDocu}, #{waybill}, #{paystate}, #{gdConsignee}, #{gdRemark}, #{gdCheck}, #{fayunDate}, #{fayunState}, #{isJg}, #{isPz}, #{editRemark}, #{xgXsphoto}, #{xgXsstate}, #{xhCheck}, #{isplaneddelivery}, #{bgcaodan}, #{bgcaodanConfirm}, #{documentsGive}, #{weightCheck}, #{customsProcess}, #{bgremark}, #{classzyNo}, #{jz2Remark}, #{rcWeight}, #{jzWeight}, #{carNumber}, #{jz2data}, #{zhengbenGive}, #{yichangDate}, #{roadtime}, #{gdtime}, #{xgtime}, #{realUnloadsite}, #{mingpaiGh}, #{cepianResult}, #{transportDept}, #{isjzLdbus}, #{causeNojz}, #{roadlogRemark}, #{actualClassbh}, #{xianghaoPlace}, #{isApplynum}, #{containerKgs}, #{lieshu}, #{guanwustate}, #{isunify}, #{classzynoTime}, #{classzynoRemark}, #{consignee}, #{consigneeE}, #{boxBelong}, #{consignor}, #{consignorstate}, #{goodsnamehs}, #{arrivalstation}, #{cbxwarehouse}, #{carrierstationcode}, #{paymentcode}, #{supplycontractno}, #{zyunitTime}, #{yundanNumber}, #{yundanWeight}, #{yundanXweight}, #{yundanTotalweight}, #{privateline}, #{consigneeR}, #{consignorR}, #{goodsnameC}, #{goodsnameE}, #{goodsnames}, #{arrivalstationhs}, #{gjkouan}, #{formalities}, #{maxTotalweight}, #{maxLoad}, #{isoCode}, #{suichestate}, #{scOperator}, #{scOperatime}, #{actualclassBh}, #{gwRemark}, #{gwPiaoshu}, #{gwOperator}, #{gwOperatime}, #{planunloadtime}, #{ydOperator}, #{scRemark}, #{scXsnum}, #{scXsnumfee}, #{scShnum}, #{scShnumfee}, #{zxWeight}, #{dlChecktime}, #{fenghao}, #{gwfenghao}, #{shifenghao}, #{goodsname}, #{consignorC}, #{fhtime},
mapper.update:
update busi_zy_info
xianghao = #{xianghao}, cepian_result = #{cepianResult},
where order_id = #{orderId} and xianghao = #{xianghao} and del_flag = '0'

update busi_zy_info
createdate = #{createdate}, createuserid = #{createuserid}, createusername = #{createusername}, lieshu = #{lieshu},
where track_id in
#{id}
mapper.delete: update busi_zy_info set del_flag = '1' where order_id = #{orderId} and xianghao = #{xianghao}
update busi_zy_info set del_flag = '1' where track_id = #{trackId}

delete from busi_zy_info where cost_id in
#{costId}
mapper.select: select cost_id from busi_zy_info where zyunit_time is not null
mapper.update: update busi_zy_info set createdate = #{createdate} where order_id = #{orderId}
